#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;
LL pm(LL a, LL n, LL m) {
  LL r = 1; 
  for (; n; n >>= 1) {
    if (n & 1) r = r * a % m;
    a = a * a % m;
  }
  return r;
}

int main() {
  int T; scanf("%d", &T);
  for (int cas = 1; cas <= T; ++cas) {
    long long C, K; scanf("%lld%lld", &C, &K);
    int r = 0;
    while ((1ll << r) <= C) r ++;
    printf("%lld\n", pm(r - 1, K, 1e9 + 7));
  }
  return 0;
}
